body_html:
@zjfheart

I have submitted PR #20791 to fix this issue. One of the patches in PowerAI's fork of Tensorflow is still needed.

If you want to try before the PR is merged, you can cherry-pick the fix:

git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
git remote add wdirons https://github.com/wdirons/tensorflow
git fetch wdirons
git cherry-pick 8a5c6c4c305905a206065b0f5fa9a86c03876428

body:
@zjfheart 

I have submitted PR #20791 to fix this issue. One of the patches in PowerAI's fork of Tensorflow is still needed. 

If you want to try before the PR is merged, you can cherry-pick the fix:

```
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
git remote add wdirons https://github.com/wdirons/tensorflow
git fetch wdirons
git cherry-pick 8a5c6c4c305905a206065b0f5fa9a86c03876428
```
